Package net.allwebdesign.common.lib.authentication

Class Summary
CustomUserDetailsService An implementation of UserDetailsService that gets authorisation data from the database
LoggedUser Extended User class to include custom variables
PasswordService An encrypted password generator class
SecurityUtils Used to get the currently logged user.
UserCache Inheriting from EhCacheBasedUserCache, it enables the construction of a default cache of users with non-expiring elements.
UserDetailsAuthoritiesPopulator Implementation of the LdapAuthoritiesPopulator that enables using for authentication the LDAP and authorisation the dadtabase
UserRowHandler An implementation of RowHoandler that handles rows with user info
